Automatically rewinds %d seconds after manual pausing. Support Translations Support and suggestions About Google Play GitHub Other apps Version: 1.0.2

Thanks for using PlayBooks!

An open source PlayBooks audiobook player. PlayBooks is based on the open source Voice application.

I would be very grateful if you leave a review or rating about the application.

Links: Licenses Copyright (C) 2020 Goodwy

along with this program. If not, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
Buy full version You are using the free version of the PlayBooks application. The free version contains no ads. The only difference between the paid version is that it has Dark theme.
If you want to support the development, you can purchase a paid version and leave a review.

Thanks!
Edit Remove Play current Refresh Reset No network? This didn\'t work too well… Crop cover Playback Welcome! Add your first audio book. Current Not started Yet Completed Sorting Name Last Played Added Grid View List View Changelog

Version 1.0.2

1. NEW: Added chengelog

2. NEW: Added support for folding devices

3. IMPROVEMENT: The design of the application has been changed, the icons have become rounded

4. IMPROVEMENT: Changed the name of the bookmark created by the sleep timer

5. IMPROVEMENT: Changed the shape of the app icon for some devices

6. FIX: Bug when deleting bookmarks

Version 1.0.1

1. NEW: Added silence skipping function

2. IMPROVEMENT: After the sleep timer ended, for 30 seconds you have the chance to shake the phone to restart the playback

3. IMPROVEMENT: Dialog background changed

4. FIX: Incorrect display of the cover on some devices

5. FIX: Flac chapter parsing

6. FIX: Bug in the chapter parsing of m4b files

7. FIX: Translation

Version 1.0.0

1. NEW: Application release
